data.eml:eml: Two new species of the genus Atractoscion, and resurrection of the species Atractoscion atelodus (Günther 1867) (Perciformes: Sciaenidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Song, Young Sun, Kim, Jin-Koo, Kang, Jung-Ha, Kim, Seong Yong (2017): Two new species of the genus Atractoscion, and resurrection of the species Atractoscion atelodus (Günther 1867) (Perciformes: Sciaenidae). Zootaxa 4306 (2): 223-237, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4306.2.3
